name: Henry The Raven
description:
Fly with Henry the Raven  through your current book. Guess how the story will continue and earn the points for . How many points will you earn?

This is a simple solo game to play during reading a book.

When the sentence continues on the other page, make a guess how many words will it have and move the bookmark one step up or down. When the bookmark flies away or hides in the book completely, the game is over and the number of pages you successfully read is your score.
